title: List of museums in County Durham
data: Located at St Mary and St Cuthbert Church , medieval room used by anchorites
Home of the Bishop of Durham for over 800 years
Focus is 1825 and 1913 life in urbanized North East England , includes trains , agriculture , industry exhibits
Former town hall , houses Bishop Auckland 's main public library , a theatre , an art gallery , tourist information centre and a café-bar
Includes fine art , decorative art , ceramics , textiles , tapestries , clocks and costumes
History of the Durham Light Infantry , located in same building as the Durham Art Gallery
website , modern and contemporary art , located in same building as the DLI Museum
Norman castle , part of University College , Durham , open for guided tours
Includes tower , monk 's dormitory , shrine of Saint Cuthbert of Lindisfarne , exhibits on the cathedral 's construction and history
website , mining in the Northern part of England
Operated by the Hartlepool Borough Council , exhibits of crafts , contemporary and fine art , and photography
Recreation of an 18th-century seaport in the time of Lord Nelson , Napoleon and the Battle of Trafalgar
Restored 19th century coastal defense battery and exhibits about local coastal artillery forces
Early 19th century Royal Navy Leda class frigate museum ship
Former 19th century lead mine , minerals , life of the miner and family
Also known as Old Fulling Mill Museum of Archaeology , part of the University of Durham , artifacts from prehistoric , Ancient Greece , Roman and Medieval periods
Local history , maritime heritage , PS Wingfield Castle museum ship
section_text: Wikimedia Commons has media related to Museums in County Durham . This list of museums in County Durham , England , contains museums which are defined for this context as institutions ( including nonprofit organizations , government entities , and private businesses ) that collect and care for objects of cultural , artistic , scientific , or historical interest and make their collections or related exhibits available for public viewing . Also included are non-profit art galleries and university art galleries . Museums that exist only in cyberspace ( i.e. , virtual museums ) are not included . To use the sortable table , click on the icons at the top of each column to sort that column in alphabetical order ; click again for reverse alphabetical order .
intro: This list of museums in County Durham, England, contains museums which are defined for this context as institutions (including nonprofit organizations, government entities, and private businesses) that collect and care for objects of cultural, artistic, scientific, or historical interest and make their collections or related exhibits available for public viewing. Also included are non-profit art galleries and university art galleries. Museums that exist only in cyberspace (i.e., virtual museums) are not included. To use the sortable table, click on the icons at the top of each column to sort that column in alphabetical order; click again for reverse alphabetical order.
